message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $10,000.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $8,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm still unable to meet at $9,000. Would you consider accepting $8,500 for the product?
